page.title: 12CASTLETOWN LEGEND-1
page.content: {THE PIPER OF WINDY HA} Long ago on a farm in the Caithness parish of{Olrig}lived a lazy boy named Peter Waters,whose job was to look after the kye.One day while looking after the kye on the{Fairy Hillock}at Sysa,he fell asleep. Suddenly he was awakened by a beautiful lady,dressed in green ,who offered him two gifts-{pipes}to make him a great piper ,or a{Bible}to make him a great preacher.He decided to take the pipes. However,the green lady told him that he must return at sunset in exactly seven years time. In time he became so rich that he had to make a{kist}in which to keep all his money.In seven years time he returned to Sysa and was never seen again.Some travellers say that they have heard muffled piping coming from underground.Could it be Peter?
